alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:50PM CDT until August 08 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL PULASKI COUNTY... At 450 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northwestern Fort Leonard Wood, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Leonard Wood... Waynesville... St. Robert... Laquey... Devil`s Elbow... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 149 and 167. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
